data.comment: The big names in today's match at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Groningen.
In the minute 1, Wessel Dammers for Groningen has been booked by Serdar Gozubuyuk and receives a first yellow card.
Tomas Suslov (Groningen) has replaced the possibly injured Arjen Robben at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
Goal! Cody Gakpo gives Eindhoven a 0-1 lead in Groningen.
In the minute 34, That's a fine assist from Pablo Rosario.
Damil Dankerlui (Groningen) gets a yellow card.
At Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium, Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Roger Schmidt (Eindhoven) has taken off Ryan Thomas who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Jorrit Hendrix is the replacement.
In the minute 51, Roger Schmidt (Eindhoven) is making a second substitution, with Chukwunonso Madueke replacing Sam Lammers.
Goal! Tomas Suslov equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Jorgen Strand Larsen instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 57, Donyell Malen scores to make it 1-2 at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
Great play from Chukwunonso Madueke to set up the goal.
Philipp Max (Eindhoven) has received a yellow card from Serdar Gozubuyuk.
In the minute 65, Jordan Teze is booked for the away team.
Eindhoven make their third substitution with Mohammed Ihattaren replacing Mauro Junior.
Groningen's Sergio Padt has been booked in Groningen.
In the minute 80, Penalty! Serdar Gozubuyuk points to the spot, great chance for Eindhoven...
Thomas Poll is replacing Bart van Hintum for the home team.
Danny Buijs is making the team's second substitution at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium with Patrick Joosten replacing Mo El Hankouri.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Daniel van Kaam with Romano Postema. This is the third substitution made today by Danny Buijs.
Eindhoven are awarded a penalty at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium. Donyell Malen takes the kick ... But misses!
It's now 1-3 in Groningen as Cody Gakpo scores for Eindhoven.
In the minute 87, Chukwunonso Madueke with an assist there.
Serdar Gozubuyuk blows to end the match. The final score is 1-3.
Nick Viergever is on a sub for Philipp Max for Eindhoven.
The away team replace Donyell Malen with Bruma.
